effect_entries.effect: Teaches Flash Cannon to a compatible Pokémon.
effect_entries.short_effect: Teaches Flash Cannon to a compatible Pokémon.

flavor_text_entries.text:
体の　光を　一点に　集めて
力を　放つ。
相手の　特防を　さげることが　ある。

The user gathers all its light energy
and releases it at once. This may also
lower the target’s Sp. Def stat.

Chi la usa attacca raccogliendo e rilasciando
energia luminosa. Può anche ridurre la Difesa
Speciale del nemico.

Un cuaderno muy práctico en el que puedes
registrar amigos, claves de amigo, etc.

Entfesselt konzentrierte Lichtenergie.
Die Spezial-Verteidigung des Zieles
sinkt eventuell.

Le lanceur concentre son énergie lumineuse et
la fait exploser. Peut aussi baisser la Défense
Spéciale de l’ennemi.

몸의 빛을 한곳에 모아서
힘을 쏜다. 상대의
특수방어를 떨어뜨릴 때가 있다.

からだの　ひかりを　いってんに
あつめ　ひかりを　はなつ。　あいての
とくぼうを　さげることがある。

The user gathers all its light energy
and releases it at once. It may also
lower the target’s Sp. Def stat.

and releases it at once. It may also
lower the target’s Sp. Def stat.

Le lanceur concentre son énergie
lumineuse et la fait exploser. Peut
aussi baisser la Déf. Spé. de l’ennemi.

The user gathers all its light energy
and releases it in one shot. It may
also lower the foe’s Sp. Def stat.
